#summary How to download the Tonatiuh source code from the CVS repository using eclipse

 # Open Eclipse and go to the CVS perspective by clicking Window->Open Perspective->Other->CVS Repository Exloring
 # Create a new repository location by right clicking the project view and using the following options
  * Host : secure.cener.com
  * Repository path: /cvsroot/tonatiuh_project
  * User: your username
  * Password: your password
  * Connection type: extshh
  * Use port: 2401
 # Click Head, navigate to the project you wish to download, select it and click Checkout.
 # The code will automatically download
